successes.title: kGoal Smart Kegel Trainer
successes.description: kGoal is an interactive training system for pelvic floor exercise.

Pledges.description: Just want to help the cause or keep up to date? Choose this reward and we'll keep you on top of progress and you can vote in polls to determine things like product color.
Show the world you love us with a Minna decal! You can put it anywhere, from a computer to a car bumper, to show your support.
Wear your support on your sleeve(s) with a stylish and comfortable Minna t-shirt. We're hard at work on a few different designs and will put the final choice up to your vote.

kGoal: EARLY BIRD SPECIAL. A great reward for our first supporters. Significantly less than our expected retail price of $175, this includes the kGoal device as well as free access to the app. Please add $25 for international shipping.

kGoal: FIRST PRODUCTION RUN. Your very own kGoal from our very first production run and still a great deal compared to our expected retail price of $175. Comes with the kGoal device as well as free access to the app. Please add $25 for international shipping.
kGoal: TWO-PACK. Get one kGoal for yourself and one for a friend. Comes with two kGoal devices and free access to the app. Please add $25 for international shipping.

kGoal: PLATINUM BACKER. In addition to two kGoals, a t-shirt, decal and free access to the app, let the Minna team take you out to lunch in SF and show your around our development lab (if you're local) or get a personalized thank you video (if you're not).

Welcome to San Francisco! Receive one of the first 5 kGoals off the production line, with your choice of personalized engraving. And, we'll fly you out to SF for the weekend to give it to you in person (and hang out with the team as well as see our setup)! US residents only.
